website_summaries.verdict: These flavorful flakes of wild-caught oceanic whitefish and sweet potatoes will turn even the pickiest of cats noses towards their kibble or wet food.
pros: Dehydrated ocean whitefish is the first of only 3 ingredients
Awesome food topper for picky eaters
cons: May seem a little pricey for a shaker of powdered fish, but cats love it

customer_reviews.title: So far it's working
customer_reviews.text: My cat was generally not picky, once she got a taste of wet food she stopped eating the dry food we were giving her. It's been a week with this and she's eating the dry food again without any issue. We're happy, and she seems happy too. We'll definitely keep buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Majape

customer_reviews.title: Basics FLAVORS All Natural, Human Grade, Grain Free Food Topper and Treat Mix for Cats (3.1oz)
customer_reviews.text: Basics FLAVORS All Natural, Human Grade, Grain Free Food Topper and Treat Mix for Cats (3.1oz) I add a little after my cat walks away from his meal, so the next time he noses up to the dish, he'll be happy again. He likes a little juice with his feed and I add a little water to keep it moist and the flavor draws him back. A good product at a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: CDP's Onceagain habit of purchasingTop Contributor: Guitars

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Not bad, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: I can only tell you what my cat told me. She found this bacony powder more palatable than her kidney cat-food, but not by much. A light dusting didn't interest her, but with a heavy dusting, mixed in with the kidney cat-food, she finally ate some of the kidney cat-food. Hooray for that, but she lost interest after a few bites, even with this stuff in the mix. If I'm going to mix something into her kidney cat-food to make it palatable, why not mix in the ordinary cat food that she likes? So that's what I'm doing now, at about 1/3 the price of this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Doug in Madison

customer_reviews.text: I am only giving it a 4 star because the product is good it definitely smells strong and it seems like it was made from natural ingredients but unfortunately my cat hates. I know that it doesn’t have anything to do with the item its just my cats preference in food. If you are looking for something that is made with little ingredients and more natural than this is the product for you, just hope your cat likes it.
customer_reviews.author: brenda trujillo

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea for finicky eaters. However even the tinest amount of this on my cats food causes him to vomit several times. I tried this 3 times, same result. My cat can eat other fish products fine so its something about this product.
customer_reviews.author: ANONYMOUS

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I just started cooking fresh food for my cat, and adding a bit of this seasoning definitely encourages him to eat more.
customer_reviews.author: J.U.

customer_reviews.title: Product seal not great
customer_reviews.text: Seal was not attached on well to container, so concernd about product expiration and safety of consumption upon receiving.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Pets loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea that regular boullion contained too much salt for pets and my cats adore gravy plus cats need a lot of water in their diets. This was perfect; even the dogs liked it when they tried it!
customer_reviews.author: Mwrites

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: My old cat loves this. It’s great that it can be used for sauces as the cat only eats pate-type of foods
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Makes my cat happy
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes this on his food. Will definitely keep buying.
customer_reviews.author: Florida Gal

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is a finicky eater, but when I sprinkle Flavors in her food, she gobbles it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cat did not like it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat is on prescription food and he wasn't eating very much of it compared to the previous non-prescription food which had a very strong smell that i think attracted him. I thought this FLAVORS product may work - but it didn't help and it really doesn't have much smell.
customer_reviews.author: Lori C.

customer_reviews.title: Helpful to get my cat to eat.
customer_reviews.text: This helps to get my cat to eat, it would be even more helpful if fish flavored.
customer_reviews.author: tammyss

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this stuff. I wish it wasn't so powdery. Definitely smells like fish.
customer_reviews.author: B. Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure yet
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure sure if they like it. I will come back to update
customer_reviews.author: Karen Dawson

customer_reviews.title: My cat is repulsed by the smell...
customer_reviews.text: My cat won't touch it, maybe I got a bad lot,...
customer_reviews.author: sweetsooziep

customer_reviews.title: as he has recently only been responding to high quality wet food ($$$$) and we refuse to buy crappy Meow Mix dry
customer_reviews.text: This didn't really do anything for my cats appetite. Was trying to get our porch (stray) cat to eat Hills dry food, as he has recently only been responding to high quality wet food ($$$$) and we refuse to buy crappy Meow Mix dry.
customer_reviews.author: LBC

customer_reviews.title: Was worth a try
customer_reviews.text: My kitty wouldn’t eat it but it smelled good to me
customer_reviews.author: vickie judkins

customer_reviews.title: Cat did not like
customer_reviews.text: My cat did not like it. Maybe other cats do.
customer_reviews.author: pattysue

customer_reviews.title: Cat is extremely picky no matter what type food she ...
customer_reviews.text: Cat is extremely picky no matter what type food she is given but she'll eat anything if it is"well seasoned" with your product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped to get my senior kitties to eat
customer_reviews.text: I used this for a short period when I needed to get some probiotics into my cats' food. I make them wet food, but you could use canned. They weren't consistently eating it, and then with the added probiotic, I figured they really wouldn't. Just a dash of this mixed in, and they ate a lot more than they did before. I don't need it anymore, but it'll be good to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried another brand of food toppers and my cats hated it. My cats love this though. I put some on their hard food in the morning and the bowl is empty by night.
customer_reviews.author: cy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, not too sure my cats like it yet. But they are also very picky.
customer_reviews.author: Nanou

product_meta.title: Basics Flavors All Natural, Human Grade, Grain Free Food Topper and Treat Mix for Cats (3.1oz)
product_meta.description: FLAVORS is a delicious, all natural food topper and treat mix created to give your cat the taste they want at every meal. If your cat is refusing to eat, bored with plain kibble, or just needs a special treat every now and then, FLAVORS is a healthy, quick, and cost-effective alternative to 'human foods' and other expensive cat products. Simply sprinkle a serving onto your cat’s food, mix with water to create a gravy or stir a small about into water to encourage hydration. You can also mix FLAVORS into homemade treats. FLAVORS was inspired by a wonderful rescue named Gracie, and we’re dedicated to improving the lives of our furry friends in need. For every container of FLAVORS that you buy, Basics donates 10% of profits to local Atlanta rescue shelters.
feature_bullets: #1 Ingredient WILD CAUGHT WHITEFISH - Ocean Fish FLAVORS is made with real wild caught ocean whitefish (cod and pollock) so your cats gets a mouthful of delicious taste with every bite.

INSTANT FOOD TOPPER - The easy-to-serve powder evenly blends with kibble so cats can't separate FLAVORS from food (like other, chunky food toppers), and it quickly MIXES with water to make delicious broth. FLAVORS is also great for a QUICK TREAT or to encourage hydration.

100% HUMAN GRADE - Made in an FDA registered facility with all human-grade ingredients. Every FLAVORS recipe is an all-natural formulation that contains no artificial or synthetic flavors, colors, or preservatives.

GRAIN FREE - No wheat, soy, corn or rice. All FLAVORS recipes are also very low-calorie and low-sodium per serving. Cats can safely enjoy FLAVORS without the problems associated with scraps off the dinner table.
MADE IN USA - All ingredients and packaging are entirely USA produced. Basics is a family owned business.
